NAY BE REPRODECED  September 7, 1908

730879f-a.text:
One of Uncle Sam's Steel Warriors Departs for Winter Maneuvere
The U.S.S. Arkansas swings down the East River under the Manhattan Bridge on its way to the Carribean Sea to participate in the annual winter Maneuvers.
1930 - International News Photo
